item.title: [bnb-chain/[**greenfield-go-sdk**](https://github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield-go-sdk)] Add a feature
item.description:
Feature Description

Added support for sending multiple messages in a single transaction. This feature allows for batch operations, such as cancelling all failed objects in one go, significantly improving efficiency and reducing gas usage.

View on GitHub
